content:
Milan legend Franco Baresi has written an open letter, assuring fans ‘we will succeed together in taking our great club to the top’.
Baresi is the ultimate one-club man, making over 700 appearances for Milan between 1978 and 1997 and winning six Scudetti, as… [+1625 chars]
